qas.question: What type of foods are generally thought of as a part of Hyderabadi cuisine?
What is a large influence on Hyderabadi food?

answers.text: a sweet porridge made with sweet gourd

qas.question: What types of cuisine are noted within Hyderabadi haleem?

context: Hyderabadi cuisine comprises a broad repertoire of <a0_0>rice, wheat and meat dishes<a0_0/> and the skilled use of various spices. Hyderabadi biryani and Hyderabadi haleem, with their blend of <a3_0>Mughlai and Arab<a3_0/> cuisines, have become iconic dishes of India. Hyderabadi cuisine is highly influenced by <a1_0>Mughlai<a1_0/> and to some extent by French, Arabic, Turkish, Iranian and native Telugu and Marathwada cuisines. Other popular native dishes include nihari, chakna, baghara baingan and the desserts qubani ka meetha, double ka meetha and kaddu ki kheer (<a2_0>a sweet porridge made with sweet gourd<a2_0/>).
